page.title: 09EDUCATION TREDIS
page.content: UNDER THE AGE OF ELEVEN,CHILDREN IN THE SOUTH AND WEST OF THE AREA GO TO DOWNDERRY SCHOOL,THOSE IN THE EAST TO ANTONY,AND THOSE LIVING IN POLBATHIC TO ST.GERMANS.A FEW CHOOSE TO GO TO CARBEILE SCHOOL, TORPOINT. PRIVATE SCHOOLS ARE AVAILABLE IN PLYMOUTH.SECONDARY SCHOOL CHILDREN GO BY BUS TO TORPOINT, AN 11-16 COMPREHENSIVE.SIXTH FORM EDUCATION AND FURTHER EDUCATION COURSES ARE IN SALTASH. A BUS IS PROVIDED FROM POLBATHIC.TRANSPORT IS ALSO ARRANGED TO THE TECHNICAL COLLEGES AT ST.AUSTELL AND CAMBORNE.IF YOU WISH TO GO TO PLYMOUTH FOR 16+ EDUCATION YOU HAVE TO MAKE YOUR OWN ARRANGEMENTS AND THE L.E.A.IS NOT PREPARED TO GIVE FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO THOSE WISHING TO GO TO PLYMOUTH IF A SIMILAR COURSE IS AVAILABLE IN CORNWALL,ALTHOUGH THE DISTANCE MAY BE GREATER.
